title: cant log in
body: cant log into pvp.net server any one have any ideas? this is what is says "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server."

replies.body: Yeah I got same thing going on for the last 1.5 hours...... West Coast Canada here.. None of my accounts working
There were some server issues, but all should be well now.  Stay updated on any server issues via [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Let me know if you still have any issues!
